title: mc_observers::KinematicInertial
description: Kinematic Intertial observer: floating base observeration from IMU and kinematics

robot.description: Name of the robot to observe (control)

realRobot.description: Name of the robot to observe (real)

imuBodySensor.description: Name of the body sensor containing IMU measurements (requires orientation)

cutoff.description: Cutoff period for the low-pass filter on velocity. Must be at least twice the timestep

anchorFrameFunction.description: Name of the datastore entry for the anchroFrame function. This datastore entry must exist.

showAnchorFrame.description: When true, display the anchor frame (control)

showAnchorFrameReal.description: When true, display the anchor frame (real)

showVelocity.description: When true, display the estimated velocity as an arrow

showPose.description: When true, display the estimated pose
